```{r}
theVars <- list(
  task=tasks,
  subject=paste0("s", subjects),
  acquisition=c("LR", "RL"), 
  test=c("test", "retest"),
  nreg=c("ar0_HRF", "ar6_HRF", "ar0_dHRF", "ar6_dHRF"),
  vox=seq(nVox)
)

iters <- expand.grid(test=c(TRUE, FALSE), acquisition=c("LR", "RL"), subject=subjects)

# Damon 2/1/22
#   some is.na for emotion
#   none is.na for gambling

for (meas in c("var", "aci", "acit", "ar6c", "ar6v", "aic")) {
  cat(meas, "----------------\n")
  
  agg <- array(dim=vapply(theVars, length, 0))
  dimnames(agg) <- theVars
  dimnames(agg)[6] <- list(NULL)
  agg_fname <- file.path(dir_project,"test")
  if (file.exists(agg_fname)) { next }
  
  # Add these results.
  time <- Sys.time()
  for (task in tasks) {
    cat(task, "\n")
  
    for (ii in seq(nrow(iters))) {
      cat(ii, "\t")
      # Get AC results.
      # if (missing[ii,task] > 0) { next }
      test <- iters[ii, "test"]
      acquisition <- as.character(iters[ii, "acquisition"])
      subject <- iters[ii, "subject"]
      ii_name <- paste0(subject, "_", acquisition, ifelse(test, 1, 2))

      # Without prewhitening ---------------------------------------------------
      ac_fname <- file.path(paste0(ii_name, ".rds"))
      ac <- readRDS(ac_fname)
      # if ("const" %in% names(ac)) {
      #   stop() # Need to check this code.
      #   # Get voxel mask. (Some voxels were constant and so do not have results.)
      #   # out <- matrix(nrow=length(theVars$nreg), ncol=nVox)
      #   # for (nn in seq(length(theVars$nreg))) { out[nn, !ac$const[[nn]]] <- ac[[nn]][[meas]] }
      #   # agg[task, paste0("s", subject), acquisition, ifelse(test, "test", "retest"),,] <- out
      # } else {
        agg[task, 
            paste0("s", subject),
            acquisition, 
            ifelse(test, "test", "retest"),c(1,3),] <- do.call(rbind, lapply(ac, function(x){x[[meas]]}))
      }

      # With prewhitening ------------------------------------------------------
      # ac_fname <- file.path(paste0(ii_name, "_pw.rds"))
      # ac <- readRDS(ac_fname)
      # if ("const" %in% names(ac)) {
      #   stop()
      # } else {
      #   agg[task, paste0("s", subject), acquisition, ifelse(test, "test", "retest"),c(2,4),] <- do.call(rbind, lapply(ac, function(x){x[[meas]]}))
      # }
    }
    print(Sys.time() - time); time <- Sys.time()
  }
  saveRDS(agg, agg_fname)
}
```
